is worked with extra length in body so actual leg length of garment is shorter than body measurements note measurements updated in april 2021 to add some extra length in the leg legs make 2 folded hem using judy s magic cast on and cc cast on 58 60 62 66 68 judy s magic cast on https //knitty com/issuespring06/featmagiccaston html you will cast on 58 60 62 66 68 on each needle and knit the first few row on the 58 live stitches on one needle leaving the other 58 provisional on the cable of the second needle when you come to knitting in the folded hem you ll be holding the first and second needles together starting with a knit row work 2 row in cc and 3 row in mc slip the first stitch of each row to make a nice selvedge for picking up stitches later k1 row on ws to make turning ridge for hem work 4 row in st st in mc to begin stripe pattern maintain stripe pattern throughout next row rs and using cc knit in folded hem as follows fold hem at the turning ridge and align the needle with live stitches and the needle with the provisional held stitches hold the two needles together with the live needle in front and the provisional needle behind using the live needle as the working needle knit one stitch from each needle together to join hem similar to a three needle bind off but without actually binding off continue in st st until leg measures 6¼ 7¼ 8¼ 9¼ 10¼ ending with a purl
